description:
Sociable Soccer Champions is an all-action carnival of fast-paced arcade football action. In addition to offering the most exciting version of the world's most popular sport, Sociable Soccer Champions allows you to assemble your dream team from an extensive roster of more than 14,000 licensed professional footballers, each with their unique skills and attributes faithfully replicated.

Experience the authenticity of the beautiful game in a variety of unique and different ways...

In World Mode you lead your favorite club through the greatest league and cup competitions from across the globe, or take your country to global glory through some of the most iconic international tournaments.

Or if you want a more immediate thrill, why not dive into a Friendly match, pitting any one of the 1,400 featured teams against any other, either against an AI opponent or head-to-head versus a friend in local multiplayer?

Sociable Soccer Champions features:

• Fast, intuitive arcade gameplay - easy to pick up, but hard to master
•  Aftertouch, powered shots, sprint and energy systems
•  Two Player Couch Clashes to relive the good old days, playing against a friend in the ultimate face-to-face match up!
•  Multiple ways to play: Coach (just watch), Casual and Pro
•  More than 14,000 FIFPRO licensed professional players to collect and upgrade
•  Up-to-date player, team and competition data for 1,400 teams from across the football world
•  More than 80 trophies to win
•  A host of unique referees, each with a different personality and style, to keep you on your toes

Join the passionate community of football fans, compete for glory and celebrate the true spirit of the beautiful game in the latest release in this this remarkable gaming franchise.
